description: Invokes the Apache Airflow REST API on the webserver with the specified inputs. To learn more, see Using the Apache Airflow REST API.

parameters.name: Name
parameters.description: The name of the Amazon MWAA environment. For example, MyMWAAEnvironment.

parameters.name: Path
parameters.description: The Apache Airflow REST API endpoint path to be called. For example, /dags/123456/clearTaskInstances. For more information, see Apache Airflow API.

parameters.name: Method
parameters.description: The HTTP method used for making Airflow REST API calls. For example, POST.

nested_items.name: RestApiStatusCode
nested_items.description: The HTTP status code returned by the Apache Airflow REST API call.

nested_items.name: RestApiResponse
nested_items.description: The response data from the Apache Airflow REST API call, provided as a JSON object.
